articles.author: Eleanor Pringle
articles.title: Rich Americans are increasingly unaware they’re classed as wealthy, say analysts—and Bain say a rise in ‘luxury shame’ means they may try to hide it - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: In the financial crisis American consumers stopped showing their wealth off because they were "ashamed" one expert tells Fortune, and this may come around...
articles.content: <ul><li>EXCLUSIVE: UBSs Paul Donovan notes that many wealthy Americans dont perceive themselves as rich, leading to confusion between the reality and perception of wealth, a distortion fueled by soci… [+5144 chars]
